CssProperty.name: will-change
CssProperty.description: Provides a rendering hint to the user agent, stating what kinds of changes the author expects to perform on the element

entry.description: Expresses no particular intent; the user agent should apply whatever heuristics and optimizations it normally does.
Indicates that the author expects to animate or change the scroll position of the element in the near future.
Indicates that the author expects to animate or change something about the elementâ€™s contents in the near future.
